ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It will come upon them suddenly when they are not expecting it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It will come upon them unawares, and they will not comprehend it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But when it comes upon them suddenly, taking them unawares,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The torment will strike them suddenly without their knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So it will come upon them suddenly, whilst they will be unaware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: It shall come to them of a sudden, while they perceive it not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And it shall come to them all of a sudden, while they shall not perceive;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: so that it will come upon them suddenly, while they are not aware,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So that it will come upon them suddenly, when they perceive not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It will come upon them suddenly when they are not expecting it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: It shall come unto them on a sudden, and they shall not perceive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: It will overtake them suddenly while they are unaware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But the (Penalty) will come to them of a sudden, while they perceive it not;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: It shall come to them of a sudden, while they perceive it not;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: so that it will come upon them suddenly, while they are unaware,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It will come to them suddenly, while they are unaware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And it will come to them suddenly while they perceive [it] not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:202] so that it will come upon them suddenly while they are not aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: So that it) the torment (will come upon them suddenly, when they perceive not) the coming of the punishment upon them.
